about_the_game:
Félix receives a mission from a powerful wizard to go to the kingdom of monsters to prevent the King from starting a war against humanity, so Félix
You need to explore an unknown kingdom and face a series of challenges during your exciting and twisting journey, but the kingdom seems to move
with his head bringing back memories of his past, and the further Félix advances the closer he gets to the truth, and his choices can shape destiny
of humanity!

How the game works

Astral Wield brings an exploration experience where the player feels free to follow the story or explore in search of better resources
To facilitate your journey, Astral Wield has real-time combat and can use special powers and armor acquired during the journey or
exploration.

A map with several areas that have optional enemies and bosses and challenges to gain improvements and armor, along with many others
inhabitants of the kingdom who need favors in exchange for improvements to the character.

Astral Wield Content

- Various areas to explore
- Extra challenges
- Optional bosses
- Improvements such as armor and optional gameplay mechanics
- A beautiful pixel art world
- Secrets and side stories
